DOC.brief_summary: Prospective , control , randomize crossover volunteer study investigate effect hyperoxemia due inhalation oxygen ( 80 % inspiratory fraction ) via reservoir-face-mask blood coagulation , especially platelet function , measure thrombelastography . According result basic animal vitro investigation , hyperoxemia may activate platelet mean reactive oxygen specie . This study aim investigate possible pro-coagulant effect hyperoxemia healthy volunteer . Additional study possible mechanism integrate . - Trial medical device
DOC.brief_title: Effect Hyperoxemia Platelet Function Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : informed consent ; coagulation disorder illness ; nonsmoker ; woman : pharmacological contraception , negative pregnancy test ; 2545 year old ; medication ; acute chronic airway problem ; 24 hour study : extreme physical activity , polyphenolcontaining food ( red wine , apple , cabbage , garlic ) ; 48 hour : caffeinecontaining drink , dark chocolate . Exclusion criterion : Lack one inclusion criterion ; allergy incompatibility substances/materials apply study ; thin veins/arteries .
